subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chicago Bears cornerback Ricky Manning Jr. and two former U.C.L.A. players — Tyler Ebell and Maurice Drew — were charged with assault yesterday for allegedly taking part in an early morning fight at a restaurant last month. Manning was charged with one count of assault by means likely to produce great bodily injury, the Los Angeles district attorney's office said. Manning is on probation for an assault in April 2002.
